entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
